document.full_text: statoil, the norwegian oil and natural gas giant, said on monday that it would sell a 24.1 percent stake in the joint pipeline venture gassled for 17.35 billion norwegian kroner.
document.title: statoil to sell pipeline stake for $3.2 billion
lines_and_colors: statoil, the norwegian oil and natural gas giant, said on monday that it would sell a 24.1 percent stake in the joint pipeline venture gassled for 17.35 billion norwegian kroner.
